column2: Discloses how employees beyond the CSR/sustainability/ethical trade team (sourcing, production, buyers, designers) incentives (e.g. bonuses; part of employee performance reviews) are tied to improvements in human rights impacts and environmental management
column3: Discloses how executive (e.g. CEO, CFO, president) pay, bonuses and/or performance reviews are tied to improvements in human rights impacts and environmental management
column4: Description of how suppliers incentives are tied to improvement in good labour practices and environmental management (e.g. long-term commitments to purchase, longer contracts, increased orders, price premiums, fewer audits)
